activities:
Personal information is requested by Bomgar when an individual orders products or services, participates in surveys, or applies for a job at Bomgar.

Bomgar may also collect information during an individual's visit to the Bomgar Network through our automatic data collection tools, to collect certain standard information such as browser type and language, access times, and the address of the website from which the individual arrived at the Bomgar Network. These Data Collection Tools may also collect information about the Internet Protocol address, clickstream behavior and product information.
